title: HOUR 3 – Tiger Woods, Zach Wilson, Lamar Jackson
itunes:title: HOUR 3 – Tiger Woods, Zach Wilson, Lamar Jackson
description:
Colin Cowherd welcomes in 2-time SB Champ Charlie Batch to discuss their takeaways from QB Kenny Pickett and more from Steelers training camp. Colin and Jason also discuss Tiger Woods' undying support of the PGA Tour and the inevitability of the LIV Series taking from professional golf's market share. Plus, Colin discusses more from Patriots camp, react to Zach Wilson’s recovery timetable, and Lamar Jackson!

Guest: 2-Time SB Champ / Steelers TV Analyst Charlie Batch

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
